About

Jekyll Paper is a simple Jekyll theme, and it is aim to helping you to create your own blog by the easiest way.

You can find more information in Jekyll Paper. If you have any questions or suggestions, you can contact me in Jekyll Paper Issues or send email to me. Wish you enjoying your blog life!
